titleStmt.title: The liturgy of the ancients represented as near as well may be in English forms calling : with a preface concerning the restitution of the most solemn part of Christian worship in the Holy Eucharist, to its integrity, and just frequency of celebration.
titleStmt.author: Stephens, Edward, d. 1706.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
